'''Waterborne Destiny''' is [[Mona]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*At Ascension Phase 4, Mona receives 23.2% {{Color|Hydro|Hydro DMG Bonus}} by default, due to her ascension stat of [[Energy Recharge]]. An extra 1.6% {{Color|Hydro|Hydro DMG Bonus}} is obtained at Ascension Phases 5 and 6, for a total of 24.8% and 26.4%, respectively.
*The effects of this passive talent do not show if Mona is [[fallen]] or not in the [[party]].
* In accordance with [[Loading Screen#Combat|the established interaction between percentage-based stat conferrals]], Waterborne Destiny does not use any points of Energy Recharge that were given to Mona as a percentage of someone else's Energy Recharge, such as from any character wielding [[Xiphos' Moonlight]].
